Posts.Content: Hi there.  New to this forum, and breast cancer fairly new to me.  While I know I could ask the hospital and breast nurse this question, thought I'd ask those who have been there.  How long might I be in hospital after a (single) breast mastectomy and reconstruction - with implant, operation?  Thanks!
Posts.Title: Length of hospital stay

Posts.Content: Thanks Tilla,  I wonder if your stay ended up longer than the initial 36 hours you were told, because it was the weekend?  I have heard that some people go home with drains still in.  I would much prefer to stay in for a few days and definitely until after the drain is out.  Here’s hoping.  Surgery is next Thursday early afternoon.  Blessings x
